translations.This stage is the moment when the LH and: This stage is the moment when the LH and FSH are in normal quatity.
translations.This stage is the moment when LH and FSH: This stage is the moment when LH and FSH as well as estrogens are in great quantity.
translations.This stage is the moment when the LH and: This stage is the moment when the LH and FSH are in very low quatity.
translations.This is the period before ovulation: This is the period before ovulation
This is the period after ovulation.
translations.Lab Explanation: It will allow the learner to interact on ovarian hormone levels (estrogen and progesterone) and pituitary (FSH and LH) to understand how these hormones control the ovarian cycle and how they ensure ovulation
